Summary:
James brought Heidi and some of her family up to a dinner Ransom cooked in a Dutch oven. After eating it, they were shocked it was cooked out in the middle of nowhere and that we would eat it when camping. Since then, we have come across a large number of people that hate camping because of the food they eat, who are shocked that Camping food can actually taste good!
And Entrees cooked in the Dutch oven are Fantastic! And, they are easy to adjust to any number of people.
(If you have enough Dutch ovens of the needed sizes.)
